Package index

rustytools functions

Main functions used in rustytools

align()
Aligns two strings using the specified alignment type.
pcha()
Call PCHA from R
rustytools rustytools-package
rustytools: This package brings several rust tools to the R environment
get_consensus()
Get Consensus Sequences from a FASTA File
find_knee_pt()
Locate the “elbow” of a monotone curve
dgC_from_components()
Build dgCMatrix from MAGIC Rust components
seurat_magic()
Run MAGIC diffusion on a Seurat object (Rust backend)

Developed by Scott Furlan.
